Reviews.Author: Laura M. Combs
Reviews.Content: The new Apple iPad 5 does exactly what I needed a tablet to do. Very fast, vivid colors, looks great. Very happy.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Device.
Reviews.Author: Ha b.
Reviews.Content: This product is incredible item, i love it. I do not know how it works in the future, but it works so well now. It connects to the web as quick as lightning.After using for few months, the iPad is still working well, but the home charger had the problem. After 30 or 45 minutes, the charger was very hot, I must unplug it and wait until it was cool down and plug in again. It took so long for fully charge on my iPad.

Reviews.Title: Very good, but still over-priced
Reviews.Author: Tybee Island
Reviews.Content: As well as they work, they continue to charge too much for the iPad and accompanying memoryHope they will change that.

Reviews.Title: IPAD with room on it...
Reviews.Author: Kusel
Reviews.Content: Can store a lot of pics, vids, games, apps on it and go through your home internet (no 4G bill). Lots of places have free WIFI and it remembers them.

Reviews.Title: Way cool
Reviews.Author: A. K. Zambeck "eye2"
Reviews.Content: I haven't used it.  It was a present for my 7 year old daughter.  She digs it and has become an expert with it.  She's downloaded a lot of free and has a great time.  She even put Skype on it and video chats with grandma and grandpa in Japan.  She can walk around with it and show them what everybody is doing.The only drawback is that she's figured out how to connect to NetFlix.  Now, My Little Pony music can be heard all over the house.  On the up side, the ending theme song for My Little Pony in Japan is done by HKT48 so that is really cool.

Reviews.Title: Really love it!
Reviews.Author: Barry Fence
Reviews.Content: I bought this device *cough* used about 3 months ago. There isn't a single day when it hasn't had use, including a trip to New York and Boston. My previous tablet was the original ASUS Transformer which had started to languish in the corner of my office because of its lack of screen responsiveness.The advantages of the ASUS over the Ipad is the openness of the file system. That's my only gripe with the Ipad (not jailbroken), is that you can't just store files on the device without the use of a specific program. (Ipad users will know what I mean.)The battery life on the Ipad is pretty impressive. With my ASUS, I would have to charge it almost every night, but the Ipad just keeps going and going. That battery capacity comes with a price, much longer charging times.Otherwise, a really amazing device that appeals to all ages.

Reviews.Title: IPAD!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Justified40cal
Reviews.Content: The packaging was very poor for my purchase, but luckily it was in good condition when I picked it up.  The Ipad is awesome and operates very well.  The battery life and charging would be the only thing I would complain about.  Its not to bad on battery life, but recharging takes 5 hours for a full charge.

Reviews.Title: my wife loves it
Reviews.Author: stargazer423
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife for her birthday and she absolutely loves it.  She has an iphone and a kindle hd, but likes the ipad much more.

Reviews.Title: Loved It!!!!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: It is awesome!!! The most fun and use I have ever gotten out of a product. If you are getting this product just for school, get a laptop. Although it is devise that is awesome for the go, it will not replace the functionality of a laptop. On the other hand, if you are looking for something to take notes on, serf the web, watch movies, and do some minor projects on, it is a can't miss.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Jose F. Cuesta "sun_moon_yoga"
Reviews.Content: Neat, resolution is great and the speed is fantastic. First tablet and so far so good. If it had office app available I would not use my PC anymore.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Dianne Ford
Reviews.Content: Still experimenting with all the features, but so far I love it!  I really got this for my husband, but he lets me use it too!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 4 w/ retina display
Reviews.Author: LJP
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad. I use an android smartphone, so you can say Apple products are new and "fresh" to me ! I learned quite a lot on how to use my iPad, my  17 year old daughter helped me too. I absolutely love my iPad and am amazed by how much I can do with it.  I will never be without one from here on. Great product.  The Apple company is fantastic, great apps too !

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Dorothy M. Larimore "dynamite duck"
Reviews.Content: After careful deliberation and investigation we felt that the Apple iPad with Retina Display 64 GB would meet all of our needs.  We will link it to an aviation program as is done in cockpits of airliners.  Couldn't be happier with it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing display!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "xXS1taXx"
Reviews.Content: As a first time Apple user I absolutely love this product. Great retina display, easy to use, etc. would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Smart4987
Reviews.Content: Great price and great find...works perfectly. I would recommend this product. I am wondering how I ever lived without it!

Reviews.Title: Can't believe I waited so long to purchase this because it's awesome
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Martin "Beths Red Shoes"
Reviews.Content: functional, useable, & already something I can't do without.  LOVE IT!  Glad I bought the larger, 64GB model with Retina Display.

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: Sérgio
Reviews.Content: i like it this product, i'll go to use this product and i think is very good for my familly

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Dex0269
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my wife and now I'm ready to get me one.Don't know how we have gone so long without one.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad
Reviews.Author: Carol A Bender
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my ipad and plan to keep on enjoying forsome time to come. I wasn't totally thrilled with the supplier butthe product itself is wonderful.

Reviews.Title: I Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Susan Page
Reviews.Content: It is even better than I anticipated. My favorite apps work great, "the Blaze", Pinterest and video podcasts. Very user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Perfect condition
Reviews.Author: Jimmmy
Reviews.Content: The iPad 4 with retina display is stunning to watch, the picture quality is better than expected. The seller sold it as in brand new condition and I couldn't tell that it was ever opened. The packaging and shipping were great and very quick.

Reviews.Title: My new iPad
Reviews.Author: Van
Reviews.Content: It's everything I expected and then some. I recommend it highly. I hardly ever use my laptop anymore since it's so portable I always carry it with me.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lenore Prelutsky
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying my iPad  there is a lot i need to learn  It is great and I am looking forward to learn a lot

Reviews.Title: Just Awesome!
Reviews.Author: JOHN
Reviews.Content: My first Apple product. Does everything you want it to. Runs fast and easy to operate. I have had it for a month. Plays movies perfect. Resolution is awesome. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: fernando Fuenmayor "nando"
Reviews.Content: Don't buy anything else, a bunch of apps and good games and free most of then, buy it over 32gb

Reviews.Title: Very Useful
Reviews.Author: Rick Fryan
Reviews.Content: This is a great Tool for me and my Business.  I like it for reading Books as well - The Battery Life is AWESOME!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this IPAD
Reviews.Author: Joanne
Reviews.Content: I had an Android tablet which worked well for me but the battery died after just 16 months.  Figured I would pay the price and try the IPAD.  The display is sharper.  Love the extra features.  I didn't expect to see such a difference.  If the battery holds up, (I have only used this for a couple nows) I expect that I will not go back to the Android tablet.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display
Reviews.Author: Cathy J. Hauptly "Cathy"
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with the product and the service.  It is exactly as described and I was very impressed with the service as well.  Would definitely do business with them again.

Reviews.Title: Latest Apple tablet--enough said.
Reviews.Author: Roy, Sr.
Reviews.Content: I really like this tablet and am very glad I waited to by it until several generations were available to learn from.  32 GB is VERY sufficent for me for both personal and business uses.

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: GUANGBO XIE
Reviews.Content: I have received my new apple ipad with retina display (16G) this morning. sealed very well, it's a new one. I have played with it for about one hour, very good.

Reviews.Title: Excelente herramienta
Reviews.Author: Daniel Camacho
Reviews.Content: El producto es una excelente herramienta diseñada para facilitarle la vida al consumidor, logrando converger hobbies, aministración de correos y redes sociales, todo en uno.

Reviews.Title: excelente producto
Reviews.Author: albert colina
Reviews.Content: 100% recomendado excelente producto, no tengo queja alguna en lo absoluto, muchas gracias por todo, estar pendiente para ofertar proximos productos de ustedes saludos

Reviews.Title: Apple I-Pad with Retina Display 32 GB
Reviews.Author: goltac
Reviews.Content: I love the sharpness of the I-Pad but have yet to find what it can do.  I'm having fun playing with it but need to learn much more.

Reviews.Title: Why we like the iPad
Reviews.Author: Dr. Arthur A. Thompson, Jr.
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my grandson and he is thrilled with it. It is "replacing" his old laptop computer.

Reviews.Title: great for everyone
Reviews.Author: Ralph B. Richey
Reviews.Content: Got it for my wife and she can't put it down. Guess I need to get one for myself. LOL

Reviews.Title: I love this product
Reviews.Author: Eddy Chance
Reviews.Content: It had a great display. It was very easy to setup and I started using it immediately. It was easy to transfer applications from my iPhone 4s to the new iPad.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad with Retina Display MD510LL/A (16GB, Wi-Fi, Black) NEWEST...
Reviews.Author: Moe Skeeto
Reviews.Content: The best way to describe this iPad is "WOW."  It has everything you need to "conduct business" when you're away, or to simply pass the time with the many included apps and games.  Works great with a nearby Wi-Fi, but also with my iPhone which has a built in "Hotspot."  Apple is the best!

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Dwight Lilly
Reviews.Content: I am extremely happy with the quality of the display.  The ipad is exactly what I was looking for in a tablet.  We are planning a trip to Germany and expect to use it for referencing and to take pictures and movies.

Reviews.Title: Loves
Reviews.Author: The Black Rapper
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it. The new Apple iPad with Retina display 32gb white 4th generation is so smooth and user friendly. Done.

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever
Reviews.Author: G
Reviews.Content: Hands down, the retina dipslay is the most amazing dipslay ever. This is the best tab,et so far. Heavily recommended

Reviews.Title: Resisted iPad for years-outstanding product
Reviews.Author: ESPRESSO MAVEN
Reviews.Content: Product is awesome-quality and display nothing short of incredible. Anxious to transfer my windows experience to apple format with xls, word and other type documents.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad
Reviews.Author: Ethel Ann McCoy
Reviews.Content: Better than I thought it would be. Easy and fun to use and want to use it all the time

Reviews.Title: I'm loving it
Reviews.Author: Daddy D
Reviews.Content: I picked this iPad up as a Christmas gift to myself. I have been looking to upgrade from a toshiba thrive. After looking at several tablets I decided to go with the iPad. Let me say there are several nice options from Samsung and google as well as other tablets that may do a few things better. Overall the iPad is the best tablet on the market as of right now. I use it everyday from listening to music and podcast to watching movies and reading various news articles. The screen resolution is amazing the sound is nice and strong. I would recommend it and if possible get at least 32g

Reviews.Title: Sorry, I will gave amazon 5 stars.
Reviews.Author: Jan. w "Jan. W."
Reviews.Content: I ordered an ipad 4 16gb wifi, but I got one that was an ipad 3 16 gb.Yes, I bought from amazon warehouse deal, nearly $400, but Ipad 4 is an ipad4 , you can not ship another one to replace it?I did not know about the different between 3 and 4, but my daughter knows them very well, she showed me the youtube,the physicaldifference about ipad 3 and 4 is the connection cable, that is why I post my review here, just be careful !!!when you receive any ipad from amazon, make sure, you got what you paid for.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: A.S.
Reviews.Content: At this point I have to rate this product a 1 because after TEN HOURS of charging it wont work.  Not with the "on/home" button trick, nada.  All I ever got on the screen was the low battery symbol when I first plugged it in and now nada.  Very disappointed and now have to go through the ordeal of returning it when I really do not have the time as this was purchased using a grant and I have less than a month to show success with students using it or it comes out of my pocket.  Joy.

Reviews.Title: Reasons I don't like iPad
Reviews.Author: M&M; "MyTrueComment"
Reviews.Content: Tablets are now better and better.  When iPad 2 came out, it was good.  iPad 4 spec was appealing.  However, I found there are some issues on iPad 4.1.  Heavy.  It is as heavy as 7 inch blackberry playbook.2.  It has been like that on setup.  You need iTune or wifi.  I don't have a Windows PC or Mac, and I need mac address to connect to my router.  How can I do it?  Apple did not think about this problem.3.  No setup guide, not a sheet of instruction.4.  Not to mention the price cost more than others.I have not connect the tablet yet.  Probably let me kid connect to his iTune and get the Mac address.  More to come.I have the ASUS tf700, and I like it a lot.  My opinion, it is better than iPad.

Reviews.Title: I am not sure whether I should rate it as 1 star, but
Reviews.Author: Xuebo
Reviews.Content: The fact is that I bought this on amazon as a gift to my wife as a bday gift. I ordered it on Monday night, it arrived on Thurs afternoon. Slightly slower than what I expected (I am amazon prime, so I have 2 day delivery free). But that is ok.The product was delivered in sealed condition with "original" package ---- at least I could not find any sign of previous usage or anything. Everything so far is so good.Then we started to initialize this Ipad. It gave me black screen for a short time, which I thought it was just normal --- probably it was loading something. And after that, it seemed to be normal all the way to the end of the setup phase. The next thing we do is to download google Chrome on it. It briefly showed a "shaky" "blurred" screen for a second or so. And then back to normal.Then we started to explore its functionality like taking pictures etc. The frequency of "shaky" screen by now increases. Then we tried to download some free games. After we downloaded the first free game (I do not remember which, our purpose was just testing) app, it went black. This time for 15 minutes or so. This time, I do not think it is normal any more.But after that, we were able to restart it. Just to find that it is now a norm of showing shaky screens all the time. And then we were browsing to find apple support using it. It is then the whole thing died. It won't come back any more. So we had to send it back.I do not know who I should blame the problem to, or just unlucky to hit this one.

Reviews.Title: UPDATED 09-24-2013 came with a screeen scratch and problem with with iIOS 7
Reviews.Author: Carlos Garcia CCS-400097
Reviews.Content: I would have given it 5 stars. But even though the Amazon Market Place's packaging for shipment was as good as required for shipping and delivering this type of merchandise, and that the Apple iPad factory box was undamaged, both wrappings intact and unopened, the iPad screen came with a noticeable two centimeter hairline scratch on top center, right below the camera lens. The scratch was visible through the factory envelope-like cellophane wrapping around the iPad itself. That type of scratch, could not had happened at the seller's warehouses, nor during transportation/delivery because it requires direct contact with the screen to produce it and as I explained the delivery package and product box where undamaged and unopened, so responsibility lies with manufacturing facility during or before final boxing of the iPad, which says a little of quality assurance and control in this case. That is, I do not blame Amazon nor the seller for the problem in this particular case (first time ever).That aside, the new iPad is working nicely and has a great retina display (colors, graphics, resolution...) and great speed. But I still will not give it the fourth and fifth stars, because contrary to what I'm used, and expect, to get from Apple products, this one didn't have that mint condition look that I expected from and Apple's new item. Instead of going trough the process of returning with all the time delay and implications (customs in my country for once)I installed a anti-glare/mate screen protector to "hide" the scratch, which somehow defeats the purpose of the great retina displayIMPORTANT UPDATE: IOS 7 have a feature that cannot be turned of, which verifies that the Lightning connector is certified by Apple, and as soon as I update to IOS 7, and connected my iPad to be charged with the Lightning connector that came with the iPad in the original, brand new, sealed and unopened factory box I got a pop up display that stated that my iPad connector isn't certified and my not function properly with my iPad. I reported this to apple via chat support and the agent told me, after running an online diagnostic, that my device and connectors were new and that it was a glitch in the IOS 7 verifying routine that would be fixed on a next release (update of IOS 7), so I dismissed (every time) the message and charged my iPad without problems. But that was until today, after connecting the new iPad with the supposedly original Apple lightning connector and receiving the  warning message, the iPad stop charging after reaching 27% charge. Beware, either don't buy this model or wait until Apple issues some kind of correction or update removing that verifying routine from IOS 7. Right now for me, living outside the US this is a disaster, returning the device, for me is not an option. So I will have to take my iPad to a Venezuelan authorized service center, testing and probably buying a new "original" lightning connector, cause if I buy the Apple care plan in the US It won't be applicable in my country.

Reviews.Title: This bad boy rocks!!!!
Reviews.Author: SB
Reviews.Content: Everything good about this device which you may have heard by now is total truth.  I bought this exact model yesterday and I have just one problem.  I can't put it down!I did a side by side comparison with my old iPad and it's like holding a rotary phone next to a smartphone.  No comparison.  Until I started using this new model yesterday, I didn't think I was missing anything but I was wrong.  So what are you waiting for?  Go buy one and see for yourself!Setup took no time because I regularly use iTunes and was able to replicate all the contents from my old iPad to my new one.  I think my hubbie might have to have one too so he can enjoy it once in a while.  Prying it out of my hands is outta the question.  :DI recommend a Satellite wireless external Hard Drive and a leather cover with pro Bluetooth keyboard and a 2 yr extended warranty.  I figure by then, there will be something new to buy anyway.I might just go back to reading books now too.  Any excuse to use this baby.  ;)

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: What can I say...great product. I'm not a very techie person but the iPad is user friendly, light, and has a great battery life. The display is crystal clear. I did have to update the software when it arrived because the camera and photo app would not work. I was ready to go the Apple store for them to trouble shoot it but my friend figured it out first.

Reviews.Title: Careful- wrong iPad sent
Reviews.Author: js
Reviews.Content: The box showed the latest iPad A1458 but the older model was in the box (A1416) along with the older style 30-pin connector.  Sending back for a refund.

Reviews.Title: So  DONE apple products
Reviews.Author: KEK
Reviews.Content: It is not the iPad as much as the apple os updates which keep messing up my iTunes and songs.  I have purchased and extensive library of songs and the past two updates have caused the songs to no longer be found showing them as not available on my iPad but trying to direct me to the cloud.  I think this is apples way of trying to force customers to pay for their cloud space which I am not interested in. It took me Hours to fix it the first time and it has happened again. Since I have all my music also on a backup drive... It is time to try a new tablet and no more apple for us.  Apple support is no help.  We are now looking at a galaxy tab and will go for that and drop all apple products.

Reviews.Title: Great upgrade experience
Reviews.Author: Dov
Reviews.Content: I bought the first iPad when it debuted a few years ago and it has gotten heavy use by my wife and son ever since. A few things happened recently. I bought a 13" MacBook Pro, but I haven't completely transferred iTunes from my PC desktop to the MB. That said, when I received this iPad 4 as a gift, I let it sit in the box for a few days while I thought about how I would transfer iTunes to the MB and start the new iPad with a fresh sync. Well, I scrapped that idea and opened the unit anyway. To my surprise, the cloud service automatically copied the apps, calendar, contacts, bookmarks etc to the new unit. I can not describe clear enough what a relief the setup was.I am super happy with this product. The retina display is nice, the speed is very good. I'm happy that all of my computing is so much easier the more I have integrated my data into this Apple world. I have used PC's for over 20 years and have never particularly liked Apple. I only wished I had moved over sooner.

Reviews.Title: a brand new ipad
Reviews.Author: Haoqi
Reviews.Content: although it's called a used one, but it looks like a brand new one by all means. feel confident to buy.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Acarsess
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband as a surprise for Christmas gift during the Black Friday promotion. It's a great product and because it came from an authorized Apple dealer, I was able to purchase Apple Care with no problem.  The iPad did not come with a SIM card which I thought it would have.  I contacted the vendor directly and got a response within a few hours of how to get one from AT&T.;  There was no charge for the SIM card.  My husband loves it!

Reviews.Title: Grandson thinks Grandpop is the best for getting him the iPad!
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Curley
Reviews.Content: My grandson loves it. I got him this for Christmas and he has it with him every time he visits. Even takes it to bed. I got the 32GB model, since we learned with the iPod that 16GB doesn't hold much. The resolution on this model is unmatched. I bought it on Amazon cheap enough that I could get a 2 year "Drop N Break" Square Trade warranty, and still had money left over the retail prices.

Reviews.Title: IPad fourth edition
Reviews.Author: Janet R. Showers
Reviews.Content: You sent me a used one as a new one. Full of someone's info. Contacts etc. my grandson who is an IT wiped it clean and I kept it but was very disappointed!!!!

Reviews.Title: Winner
Reviews.Author: Adena
Reviews.Content: Love my iPad, however this need it has to just randomly close out of apps is rather annoying. Other than that the 4th generation was a great cheaper buy for me through Amazon, rather than buying the Air with just not enough differences!

Reviews.Title: ipad with issues
Reviews.Author: keith weaver
Reviews.Content: so far my ipad has messed up twice. I did a complete reinstall the first time and this time i am considering contacting the seller to get a replacement for it. My printer is completely compatable with it...HP officjet 8600 wireless....The first time it quit communicating with my network and it caused my printer date and time settings to change...the date jumped ahead a day. I first reset the printer settings and then reset it on my network. The ipad still wouldn't communicate with it so i hooked it to my laptop and did a reinstall. It worked great for maybe 2-3 weeks and yesterday it quit communicating with my printer again only it didn't affect the printer settings. The printer works wirelessly with my other computers fine and i really don't want to do another reinstall as this shouldn't be necessary. Keith Weaver

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 4
Reviews.Author: B. Embree "Bet"
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Lightweight, easy to install, easily transportable.  Font size adjustable.  Sharp and clear photos.  Makes life so organized because you have everything at your finger tips 24/7

Reviews.Title: Unboxing iPad 4 (1st Impressions)
Reviews.Author: M. W. Trimble

I chose this over the iPad Air due to its specs being similar minus the size and upgraded chip; other than that I couldn't justify spending more for essentially the same device at 128 gigabytes.I upgraded to iOS 7.0.4 right out of the box via wifi in about 15 minutes (it aborted the first time but after plugging it in to the power outlet attempt #2 was a success!)Where I do not love Apple is in having to start from scratch & reload this new iPad with my content from the iPad 2 (no I do not & refuse to use iTunes due to its cumbersome nature & counter-intuitive user interface [I did use iTunes once but when my laptop was stolen & I synced my iPhone 4 to my new laptop iTunes would NOT let me sync it as Apple only allows ONE computer to be physically registered/assigned to an iDevice] so begins the tedious process of porting everything over.I DO though LOVE that Apple's enture suite of software is now available for download for FREE with iOS 7!I will update you all with further observations but judging from my iPad 2 experience I have no doubt i will LOVE this iPad 4 (the retina resolution OMG is a VERY vivid much needed improvement to the iPad). If you do have a physical disability or missing a body part the iPad is very handicap friendly. I type flawlessly with my toes on the keyboard and from time to time use my nose as a thumb if you will.[...]

Reviews.Title: Simply the best tablet on the market
Reviews.Author: AppleSaucer "Paul"
Reviews.Content: The spectacular 9.7 inch Retina Display in Apple's full-size iPad is now matched with a custom System-on-Chip (SoC) that has the graphic muscle to take full advantage of its capabilities. The screen on this iPad is incredible! It totally blows away my HDTV.The 4th generation iPad also offers an overall speedier response than the 3rd generation model, along with the tiny new Lightning connector instead of a traditional 30-pin type. If you have a lot of peripherals that fit the older connector, you will need to a buy an adaptor if you want to keep using themI find myself using the iPad for roughly 80% of the activities that I used to do on my laptop. It is now my first choice for web browsing, and it is great for reading e-books. And it is more and more often my preferred way to watch movies and TV programs.Before buying, I compared this iPad to other high-quality tablets such as the 10-inch Nexus. As far as the displays go, the iPad was the clear winner. If the quality of the graphics is high on your list of priorities for a tablet, the 4th generation iPad is far and away the best choice.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: J. Meyers
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad. I have used the previous generations (I work in IT). The retina display and thee processors (central and graphics) are awesome. The display is slick and smooth like water and amazingly clear. The response time is awesome. Videos are super clear in HD and games on this thing rock! The WiFi speeds are great. I am also using it for GarageBand which is like getting a portable recording studio for $5. I have traditionally been a Windows/Microsoft guy, but this thing just blows me away. I have several Andriod devices, which are very good too, but what this does, it does at a level that is unmatched. If you're thinking about buying and haven't used one much, just do it... you won't be sorry.

I think that it was dishonest of them to not mention this. Who wants to do business with a company like that?  I originally thought that it was an error on their part and that once alerted to this they would make it right.  I sent them an email and when that didn't get a response I went to Amazon's Customer Service.  They kindly wrote an inquiry for me but they didn't even get a response.  If I had discovered it sooner I would be shipping this back, but unfortunately for me it was just after the allowed return date!  So, I am sounding the alarm for all who would be tempted to purchase from them - don't buy from Tech Giant.

Reviews.Title: Keeps restarting, wont stay powered on
Reviews.Author: Jason "Jason"
Reviews.Content: I bought this ipad for my wife and son to use. It is the first apple product to hit our home since the iphone 3 failure we had a few years back. So we got the ipad last night and proceeded to set it up. Everything was fine until we tried to use it. The first app we used caused the ipad to restart. So we tried again. Again 1 min into use and it restarted again. We thought, oh, maybe this thing cant download apps and use them at the same time. If that were the case I would return it for sure and not buy another because that is just ridiculous. Luckily that was not the case. The third time we tried an app we had nothing downloading, updating or anything, and it restarted again. I went to apples site to try to talk to someone about it and when I entered the serial number the site said it was out of warranty and no tech support could be used. That told me that there was an error or I was just sold a used ipad. Since amazon doesn't print the serial numbers on the receipt there is no was for me to prove I bought the ipad that same day. I then spoke to amazon about this and they said since I bought it thru a marketplace person we couldn't exchange it but had to return and buy it over. I thought fine...I will go and do that. Well, while I was on the phone the ipad timed out and went to sleep, but it wouldn't wake back up. So I called apple this morning and spoke to them about it. They told me it is possible the item was used before but there is no way for them to find out. They had me do a hard restart which made it possible for the ipad to turn on again but about 5 min after I hung up with the guy it turned off again and wouldn't turn back on. So I made my mind up. I hard restarted the thing, wiped it clean, and will mail it back Monday. Meanwhile, later today I will go to the apple store and buy one from them, brand new, with warranty. I figure this is apples 2nd strike against me. The only 2 apple items I have own were both defective, so either I have the worst possible luck or apple has fairly low quality standards. If I get a third defective product from them its over.Lesson here....check the serial number on apples site as soon as you get your item.

Reviews.Title: Great, but not a huge leap from iPad2
Reviews.Author: PositiveLogic
Reviews.Content: I own an iPad because it has business apps I use that are best used with a touch screen. One pros side, there's not much I can add to what's already been said. It is great and I'm glad I upgraded from an iPad 2 to iPad 4.But I'm deducting one star for the following reasons:Apple wants to upsell you from the iPad 2 to the iPad 4 mostly on this criteria:1) Siri. There's nothing revolutionary about it. For most it's answers it just spits out Google search results and then you do the rest. People are fascinated by it because it throws a few human-like colloquialisms.2) Retina display. I upgraded from an iPad 2. To quite frank, things do no all of a sudden jump out at you in iPad 4. Yes, I do like it. And it's very nice to be sure. But the Retina Display is just a name someone dreamed up that makes it sound more innovative than it actually us. High resolution is everywhere. It's just that Apple give it a snazzy name and suddenly, it's like the a new invention.3) "A6 is 2x faster than A5" Huh? Reality check. This one is probably where I feel people are misled the most. To me the A5 is noticeably faster and that's nice. But in real life "twice as fast" means 50 mpg vs 25 mph. Or flying from L.A. to Hong Kong in 8 hours instead of 16. To me the speed difference is more like flying from L.A. to Hong Kong in 14 hours instead of 16.All in all, there a lot of hype that used to make the iPad 4 sound like a quantum leap rather than the incremental improvement that it is. Thus we pay more for it.That said, I like it a lot, but mainly for the reasons that people have liked the iPad ever Steve Job unveiled on that big screen behind him...not because of these minor improvements.

Reviews.Title: maybe refurbished
Reviews.Author: andrewaa
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a new one. But the cable is broken very soon. I went to the apple store and the customer said the cable is definitely fake and the device was activated last November. The store is TechGiant.

Reviews.Title: iPad with Retina Display 4th Generation is simply powerful
Reviews.Author: Malay
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to upgrade from older ipad 2 and I can already feel the difference in performance. The only problem with iPad is it can't replace Full functionality of your Mac or Windows PC or not even Android as it is locked down in terms of OS and You have to use things the way Apple wants you to use it and have no freedom of choice. You can have numerous Apps to do your usual stuff and have to keep track of it and use cloud etc. which is constant data connection and churning battery a lot. I have used Tablets and Smartphones in last 7-8 years and I am very deep techno user and have used all the Platforms and eco systems.

Reviews.Title: Nice IPad
Reviews.Author: ALBERTO GUERRERO
Reviews.Content: Like any Apple product quality is there ,I love everything in this IPad,I have try different featuresand I love it.

Reviews.Title: connection and battery failure, is useless
Reviews.Author: Veronica Fleitas2
Reviews.Content: The battery doesn't charge.Does not establish connection with my laptop or any other computer.It would be useless when the baterry runs out.

Reviews.Title: Delivered in perfect condition, unopened. Seller is legit!
Reviews.Author: Poo-Jangles
Reviews.Content: My iPad was delivered to me in perfect condition, completely unopened and it works very well. Having said that, I wish I did not buy an iPad that was stuck to Sprint because I cannot get the internet anywhere. Instead, I ended up buying a Jetpack from Verizon and paying $45 a month so I can have internet access.Also, iPads are apparently useless for Accounting students. It's great for games and entertainment but the apps for Business and Accounting are expensive and unreliable. I will be giving my iPad to my little brother and buying a Google Nexus tablet when I finish paying off the money I owe Amazon for my useless iPad.This seller definitely gave me what I asked for and in perfect condition, which is the only reason I gave 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Choi
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my girlfriend.  She likes it.  I do not know much about these toys but one thing I did notice that is a pain is that the screen will flip/rotate depending on how you are holding it.  I understand why it does that but I wish there was some way to disable that.  Sometimes when I am laying down reading an ebook on the iPad the screen is constantly rotating and I am constantly having to change my body position.  Super annoying.

Reviews.Title: Not all that happy with my Ipad
Reviews.Author: Elsa Ruth Spillers
Reviews.Content: Its ok. having trouble with wifi. not the greatest piece of equipment. Not very impressed.  I should have stayed with my lap top

Reviews.Title: Expensive but only tablet worth getting
Reviews.Author: Sohil
Reviews.Content: Had iPad 1 & 2, needed another so even though it's very expensive, had to get it.I don't like Apple/MAC products but they have left us no choice

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Zhenong Jin
Reviews.Content: Seem nothing is bad, but nothing is more than expectation.Apple is just apple.Additional 100$ for 16GB may not be necessary for most app oriented people.

Reviews.Title: good quality, on time deliver
Reviews.Author: Pamela Chen
Reviews.Content: This is my first time to buy ipad on Amazon, but this deal is as good as I can expected. On time deliver and ipad is good in quality. But maybe it's still the latest version of ipad, there's no discount for this. But it really works good!

Reviews.Title: Very good tablet!
Reviews.Author: Gustavo
Reviews.Content: The package was well protected and it arrived very fast! To start using the tablet is very easy and it seems to me a good tablet!

Reviews.Title: Larger hard drive, new connector
Reviews.Author: newgrounds
Reviews.Content: It's a pain that this iPad requires you to buy all new cables (like the iPhone 5), but it's awesome that it has a larger hard drive.I highly recommend this to anyone looking to upgrade or get into the world of iPads.

Reviews.Title: So anxious to get started!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Navin
Reviews.Content: Just getting started. I really don't know enough about it yet to comment.The customer service from  L2D2 was amazing. It was well packaged, and I could not believe how quickly I received it!I am anxious to really get started and to enjoy my new ipad.

Reviews.Title: Great but not Awsome
Reviews.Author: jwoods000
Reviews.Content: I love apple products. Very simple easy to use but they need to change it up a bit. The ipad is great it has a beautiful screen and it does everything that i need. I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Only because of jailbrake I can say I like the Ipad
Reviews.Author: Javier Puche
Reviews.Content: Mac products are stylish and well made, but software is a limitation. This is my first mac product since I have an smarth phone with android and a toshiba laptop. Hardware on this Ipad has good performance, it has good quality screen and the processor is fast opeming apps and navigating. What I did not like is all the restrictions that one as an user has when interacting with another brand devices and even with file management. I am tech savy maybe what I am writing is not relevant for other kind of users, but I like to get full use of the things I buy. For example with ipad bluetooth sharing can only be made between mac devices. File management non existant, just media folders, among other things. This is what made me give jailbrake a try. After installing it and experiment all alternative apps it offers I felt l in heaven, now I could say that the Ipad was mine, it was freedom. If it wasnt for cydia I would have sell  the ipad for sure and go to a samsung tablet.

Reviews.Title: 내 항문 정말이 기술을 좋아
Reviews.Author: Pizza Cat
Reviews.Content: 내가 이걸 어떻게 설명해야할지 모르지만 당신은 자기 인식 소프트웨어의 첫 번째 종류처럼 사이버 존재의 비행기에서의 미래에 느낌이, 젖은 뇌 공간의 또 다른 경우는 진공에 빨려 들어갔다 라인을 제공 코드. 모든 너무 기술의 통합 엉망으로하고 그 이해 이있 . 우리가 너무 우리가 텍스트 문자 three hundred 선으로 제한 할 수 있습니다 인정하고 겁이 때문에 우리가 인정하기 꺼려 야 같은 규모는 동물 우리를또한 버락 오바마 제 남편입니다

Reviews.Title: Don't buy if you can't get wi-fi
Reviews.Author: Diane Garner
Reviews.Content: This iPad doesn't come with the ability to get internet UNLESS you can get to wi fi. Had I know this I would have opted to pay more and get one that does!!!

Reviews.Title: Just doesn't hold a candle to my Asus Transformer
Reviews.Author: Perry
Reviews.Content: No SD, microSD, no USB, no dockable keyboard that also charges the tableet when connected. I could go on but I don't want to waste anymore of my life on it...

Reviews.Title: You gotta be kidding me
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: $1400 dollars? I can think of some many electronics way under this price tag before making any purchase. Spend the money on something else and something else and something else and an ipad 4th gen with 16gb.

Reviews.Title: HATE IT
Reviews.Author: Sandra B. Oakman "newkayaker"
Reviews.Content: what else is there to say. To many steps to load anything; can't go back to a previous page easily. Hate it!!! Hate it!!!

Reviews.Title: Printing
Reviews.Author: Christopher A. Paulsen
Reviews.Content: To print from an Ipad you need a special printer as most printers are incompatible. You must have an air printer and that usually means buying another printer. I would make sure I could print before buying an Ipad and compare it to the printing capabilities of other pads. Also you cannot add memory to the Ipad.For me the Ipad ended up being a game tablet and a device to use for face time only.Many other pads will allow additional memory and printing.

Reviews.Title: My first IPAD
Reviews.Author: Claire I. Desjardins
Reviews.Content: This was my first IPAD.  So, far I've enjoyed using it...It has many features...I did buy a book, IPAD for seniors..and it has helped a lot.  The book has made be aware of the many, many features loaded on this IPAD.  I'm still in the learning process. Enjoying themany free. games..............As far as I'm concern, this was a great purchase. This was also, my first Apple Purchase.Claire Desjardins

Reviews.Title: BEWARE! APPLE DEACTIVATED MY IPAD, FORCING ITUNES USE
Reviews.Author: A. Sternad "CongaDr"
Reviews.Content: APPLE JUST DEACTIVATED MY IPAD!! NO JOKE, FORCING ME TO USE ITUNES OR IT WILL NOT FUNCTION! BEWARE! MUCH LESS EXPENSIVE TABLETS OUT THERE.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the price.
Reviews.Author: Douglas Sanders
Reviews.Content: The iPad 4 is really good but not worth market price. When I saw the price I was ok with it at first because I thought it was 4g ready but you still have to pay for that. It has outdated low-end specs. Id rather get a laptop or a tv with that money. Im not worried about it though I got my Kindle Fire HD and getting excited about the HDX. Which in comparison to iPad 4 do opposite. They are high end technology tablets sold at generic tablets price. Thank you Amazon.
